attributes.contentHtml:
Hello, I'm not here to start some bullshit fight, I'm just here to warn you not to use LeetNodes. Just last night (May 4th), they posted an announcement with two emails they had the domain censored out, however, they did something like thisisarandomemail@#####.com, so I easily found out that it was a gmail domain. I told one of the staff that it was very VERY insecure to do that. They then deleted my message, so I made a new one saying that I'll be collecting data on them for, well, this post. They decided to ban me. $MoneyBoi$#0999 is the owner. LeetNodes used to be known as SakuraNodes are something.

Anyways, like I said in the beginning, not here to cause a bullshit fight, just here to let you know that LeetNodes is very very insecure, and you shouldn't use them.
TheMGDEV Hello TheMGDEV i would like to inform you if u actully looked at the email it was so########@#####.c## so if u think we would acctually expose an email its self then you are wrong.
